channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tool Up for Lower Rates With Stanley Black & Decker
item.description: Having gone through cost cutting, the toolmaker is poised to benefit from a housing rebound.

item.title: Why this tech investor says Jensen Huang and Elon Musk are the best CEOs
item.description: Gavin Baker, the chief investment officer at Atreides Management, is a fan of two of the Magnificent Seven CEOs.

item.title: Credit Scores Without Debt? Fintech Cards Baffle Credit Industry
item.description: So-called credit-builder cards let users deposit money to pay bills. The fintechs say this counts as borrowing. The companies that create credit score...

item.title: Nvidia missing earnings is the AI bears’ dream — but they’ll be disappointed
item.description: Nvidia’s key customers are Meta Platforms, Alphabet, Amazon.com, Microsoft and Tesla — and they’re spending big.

item.title: Fighting Financial Crime Could Pay for Nasdaq
item.description: The exchange company has diversified into more services for banks, including anti-financial crime tools.

item.title: My $2 million inheritance is sitting in cash — and I have no idea where to start
item.description: A sudden windfall can cause all sorts of problems if you aren’t ready for it.

item.title: Prudential PLC Operating Profit Rose in First Half
item.description: Prudential PLC reported higher adjusted operating profit in the first half of the year on higher profits from its insurance and asset-management busin...

item.title: Mortgage rates fall for fourth week in a row to lowest level in 16 months
item.description: Mortgage applications rose 0.5% on a weekly basis, the Mortgage Bankers Association said.

item.title: Warren Buffett Is Selling Bank of America. Maybe You Should Buy It.
item.description: The lender has some advantages relative to its megabank peers in an interest-rate-cutting scenario.

item.title: Relief is on the way for hot, hungry trekkers on the Great Wall of China: 5-minute deliveries by drone
item.description: Market leader Meituan has launched a service that flies food, drink, medicines and other parcels from a nearby hotel rooftop to one of the ancient wal...
